name: Bulk WGS
description: Bulk whole genome sequencing (WGS) using short-read or long-read platforms.

name: RNA-Seq
description: Bulk whole transcriptome sequencing using short-read platforms.

name: WGS NanoSeq
description: Nanorate sequencing, Duplex sequencing strategy.

name: NT-Seq
description: Comprehensive DNA methylation sequencing to profile 6mA, 4mC and 5mC sites.

name: snRNA-Seq
description: Single-nucleus RNA-Seq.

name: CODEC
description: Concatenating Original Duplex for Error Correction (CODEC) Duplex-Sequencing strategy.

name: WGS DLP+
description: Low-depth, high-throughput single-cell WGS using microfluidic devices and individual cell image capture.

name: ppmSeq
description: Paired plus minus sequencing (ppmSeq); Duplex sequencing strategy.

name: Fiber-Seq
description: Profiles of chromatin fiber structures using nonspecific DNA N6-adenine methyltransferases.

name: Hi-C
description: Genomewide profiling of chromatin interactions.

name: Kinnex
description: Multiplexed Arrays Sequencing of transcript isoforms; high-throughput sequencing of mRNA isoforms using long-read platforms.

name: 10X Genomics Xenium
description: Targeted spatial RNA-Sequencing.

name: STORM-Seq
description: Single-cell total RNA Miniaturized sequencing; a single-cell full-length ribo-reduced total RNA sequencing using short-read platforms.

name: Tranquil-Seq
description: Single-cell full-length RNA-Seq using long-read platforms.

name: CompDuplex-Seq
description: Duplex-Sequencing strategy at a single-cell or bulk tissue resolution.

name: MALBAC-amplified WGS
description: Single-cell whole genome amplification method.

name: TEnCATS
description: Cas9-targeted enrichment for L1 mobile elements

name: ATAC-Seq
description: Assay for Transposase-Accessible Chromatin using sequencing (ATAC-Seq); genome wide profiling of chromatin accessibility.

name: ATAC-Seq
description: Assay for Transposase-Accessible Chromatin using sequencing (ATAC-Seq); genome wide profiling of chromatin accessibility.

name: HiDEF-Seq
description: Hairpin Duplex Enhanced Fidelity Sequencing (HiDEF-Seq) Duplex-sequencing strategy.

name: VISTA-Seq
description: Tn5 transposase-based Duplex-sequencing strategy at a single-cell, microbulk (10 to 100s of cells), or bulk tissue resolution.

name: scDip-C
description: Diploid chromatin conformation capture (Dip-C); single-cell genomewide profiling of chromatin interactions.

name: HAT-Seq
description: Human Active Transposon sequencing (HAT-Seq); a PCR-based targeted bulk sequencing method for identifiying L1Hs insertions at a single-cell, microbulk (10 to 100s of cells), or bulk tissue resolution.

name: L1-ONT
description: Enrichment for L1 mobile elements followed by ONT sequencing.

name: PTA-amplified WGS
description: Primary template-directed amplification-based single-cell whole genome amplification.

name: Strand-Seq
description: Single-cell template strand sequencing.

name: varCUT&Tag
description: Identification and characterization of sequence variants in regulatory elements and genes.

name: Slide-tags snRNA-Seq
description: High-resolution spatial genomics assay for single-nucleus RNA sequencing.

name: GoT-ChA
description: Genotyping of Targeted loci with single-cell Chromatin Accessibility (GoT-ChA); single-cell multi-omic assay for linking mutations to chromatin accessibility profiles.
